system.description:
You continue to find new and useful ways to mix the power of your devotion and your connection to elemental forces together. You gain the following benefits:

  • When using @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.c6aiq8cd90fo3ry1]{Divine Smite} without an empowered or greater empowered option, you can choose to deal any type of damage that you could normally deal with your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uit7l3mc64l5h8h1]{Elemental Blast}.
  • Half your elementalist levels count as herald levels for the purpose of gaining the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.xezwxikwrsfkzg4o]{Sacred Aura} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.eg3jukesb09wd7ot]{Improved Sacred Aura} features.
  • You gain proficiency with your choice of the Cutting Omen or Sanctified Steel combat tradition and gain a maneuver of a level you could learn from the chosen tradition. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
  • At the start of your turn, you can convert elementalist spell points to @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.my42mip0qc35rcp2]{Lay on Hands} points at a 1:2 ratio (no action required). You cannot perform this conversion in reverse.
